name: parserator-monorepo
description: Parserator - The Structured Data Layer for AI Agents

scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @parserator/types && npm run build -w @parserator/core-api-client && npm run build -w @parserator/browser-sdk
scripts.build:components: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:vscode && npm run build:python && npm run build:node && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build -w api && npm run build -w mcp-server
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:components
scripts.package:all: npm run build:all && echo 'All packages built successfully'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:api && npm run test:chaos
scripts.dev:setup: echo 'Setting up development environment...' && npm install
scripts.worktree:setup: git worktree add worktrees/feature-testing feature/testing-infrastructure && git worktree add worktrees/feature-ci-cd feature/ci-cd-infrastructure
scripts.worktree:clean: git worktree remove worktrees/feature-testing && git worktree remove worktrees/feature-ci-cd
scripts.release:prepare: npm run test:all && npm run build:all && npm run version:bump
scripts.release:validate: npm run publish:validate && npm run publish:monitor

author: Paul Phillips <phillips.paul.email@gmail.com>
